Review.Contenu: I kinda hate this app/ web, my teacher in the past sent me a link to a padlet board for me to use. At the beginning it was alright but i later realized that when you go onto another devise you can't edit posts you made on the last devise this mean i have multiple of the same thing with only slightly different things on them. Now that Ive been looking online for reason for this i realised that it is because i havent been able to login when working on it. I have tried to work out a way to fix this and i can't.

Review.Titre: Padlet platform is a tool for hackers to use currently
Review.Contenu: We just got a Phishing scam from a hacker that was using a padlet.com URL to fool users and gaining full access to users  emails and then spamming out emails from the users account, address list and contacts further spreading out the hack. Email security does not flag the Padlet.com link in the emails from known good users as phishing or spam alert, allowing the attacker emails through security and gaining access to users account with their credentials and MMA information. What a nightmare
Padlet was quick on answering my question. My Padlet assignment I gave to my students was easy for me to explain and easy for them to make. Thank you
Easy to use, easy to access, easy to create based on needs. Seamless transition between mobile and web on different browsers as well! Customer support was prompt and helpful!

Review.Titre: Padlet: A pat on your back!
Review.Contenu: I have been using Padlet in my teaching and learning sessions for more than a decade. I simply love it. I love to see that my resources are structured, easily accessible and password protected for security reasons.

Review.Titre: I highly appreciated your prompt and…
Review.Contenu: I highly appreciated your prompt and effective responses to my propblems. So far, I have been enjoying Padlet in my teaching job. it works perfectly. Many thanks

Review.Titre: After my school district email changed…
Review.Contenu: After my school district email changed due to a name change, I couldn't access my Padlets. I contacted Padlet with a request to link my account, associated with my former email, to my new school district address. This process was done within minutes, and I had to provide minimal documentation. The person I was speaking with, Aly Dalgetty, was prompt and personal in her responses.

Review.Titre: Great for personal use, even greater for sharing thoughts for everyone.
Review.Contenu: Padlet for personal, at that price, makes sense. Padlet for small organization, as long as you have below 50 members, for most uses, also makes sense.Think of padlet as a whiteboard, and you can have many whiteboards. Each whiteboard though, can have some limitations, such as who can post on it, and who can comment on it. Each padlet can be linked to another padlet, but it doesn't necessarily have to be so. In fact in many cases it is probably better to keep everything in one padlet, as long as you design a padlet properly with the correct permissions for interactions. Even the way the settings is done makes sense.  The learning curve isn't bad. You just have to pay attention to the basics, and then all of a sudden it'll start making sense once you start having people interact with your padlet and you learn "oh this works, and oh this is not how I probably want it to work". In my case it took me 2 padlets with interactions (with my students) to figure out what design I want, how I want to set the permissions, etc. The pricing for platinum (at least for me) makes sense. I think its even cheaper now, and its also feature richer than the last time I remember it to be (years ago). So its not a static product, and it has evolved to be a better product.  What made me continue to subscribe is the constant update and the continual support by the after-sales service which helped me to choose the correct plan (and the cheapest also, which suit my needs).

My partner teacher and I love using Padlets with our K1 kids! Each week we ask them a discussion question where they post a picture and a response. This is a good place for them to share all of their favorite things, their least favorite things, and holiday excursions. Then we can present the board and make everyone feel special without taking a long time for each kid to talk. Padlet is our favorite!!

Review.Titre: my time with friend when we are on break
Review.Contenu: my time with friend when we are on summer break and we chat all the time but not now cause we stopped using padlet for 2 months and got back on but only few of my friends chat with me but im still happy
My issue required multiple emails and a bit of investigation. Aly was fully engaged in solving the problem and stayed with it all day until she found a solution.

My experience on Padlet is amazing! They people who have helped me, when I had trouble getting to Padlet, I Thank them so much, not only them but every other person who has helped people with their issues. Carla Was just amazing, she was so nice, kind, and sweet about it, I like how you guys are so nice toward the people who have Padlet. I really do highly recommend Padlet!

Review.Titre: Padlet helps my students organize their…
Review.Contenu: Padlet helps my students organize their notes. They are always prepared and we don't waste time looking for the right note, right printout or whatever. How can you use Padlet? Well, sky is the limit plus you can rely on quick and professional support team.

Review.Titre: Padlet is great, service very friendly
Review.Contenu: Padlet is great for sharing materials with students. They also fixed a technical issue really quickly. Very friendly communication

Review.Titre: I feel Padlet has made my life a lot more interesting.
Review.Contenu: I feel Padlet has made my life a lot easier in terms of accessibility and every thing else, but being both a webpage and an app just emphasizes everything padlet has to offer.So join me and over a million people and use Padlet!

The representative [Jonathan] was very informative, courteous and prompt with his responses.  He provided alternative quotes as requested and provided prompt follow-up.  The Curriculum Director here at our school is very excited about the product and has pushed it forward for District approval.  Thanks to your representative, we may have a new an exciting product here in our District.
Quick, friendly, efficient service when I emailed with an invoice query.

Review.Titre: A brilliant invention - The padlets themselves are such a great…
Review.Contenu: Padlets are such a great tool. I absolutely love them.They are wonderful for organising ideas, adding documents and links, and for interacting with students. They are also good for students to work independently or in groups, in or out of class.They are so simple and straightforward to set up, but support so many links, images and posts - each padlet is a fantastic resource.The customer support is also excellent. Many thanks.

Review.Titre: Good, creative and productive experience using Padlet
Review.Contenu: They're a space to become creative and with their continous updates as well as their creative presentation, they inspire you to become more creative. I've used Padlet for about more than two years now and I've not faced any issue - you get exactly the same thing they tell you; furthermore, they continue to make updates and listen to your feature requests. Their support when you have a certain question is very welcoming as well as helpful. I'd definitely recommend Padlet for many use cases. Sometimes all you need is the free version, but also the paid plans offer great things too.

Review.Titre: ..I was really happy that you helped me…
Review.Contenu: I was really happy that you helped me recover my account. I had lost hope of recovering it, but thanks to your wonderful service and the speed of communication with me, I was able to solve my problem... Thank you. 3>

Padlet makes me feel like I don't do hardcore work because this is just like keeping notes! Whenever I have a problem, there are at least 2 people to help me, which makes me happy and proud! Padlet is an amazing app to have because it can also help little children, as well as adults.

I sent a quick email .. and received quicker reply .. the information  that was included in the reply .. helped me to figure out where is the problem .. i also love the positivity and the nice language  in the email through some words ..

I asked a fairly complex question using the Contact form on Padlet's site. It required a thorough understanding of my role and my organisation's connection(s) with Padlet. Within an hour Audrey had clarified, enacted and confirmed the resolution of the issue.That's how customer support should work.Thanks Audrey and Padlet.
As a music teacher in elementary school with 20 classes. This is an absolute must for planning, everything is at the same place and it’s visual and easy to use.

I am pretty happy with Padlet as it gives me a chance to relate to my students in a more direct way- with visuals and text. I would like to see more versatility in the amount of images we can present in the posts.

The team of padlet have been nothing but helpful when ever I need it, I would recommend padlet to every one, it's a grate way to take notes, and write story's witch I personally love doing, hell I'd say padlet is better then useing docs,it's worth checking out❗❗, they even take the time to write back to help even if there's something that they can't help with they will still try and I appreciate how they take time just to help us❗so please consider checking out padlet❗❗-nigel
Helpful, quick, and efficient service when I needed customer service. I have used this product for 3 years in my classroom and find it easy to use. I am happy to continue using it.
Customer service is friendly and supportive especially with art and it’s  different context!
Product is great for planning, brainstorming, also in teams. When in need of support, it was received quickly and solved issue. Product has a very nice “vibe”

Padlet is really intuitive to use. The Padlet team is super reactive and competent. Having to provide a professional solution for a brainstorming at work, I have been completely satisfied by Padlet services.

Great tool and perfect customer service. Sure, if you are in Europe, you cannot pretend to get an answer the same day, but be sure you'll get one, should you have an issue: a very nice and competent one, that will do all they can to solve your problem. It is really worth paying their plans to work with this tool.Thanks, Crissy
The response was quick, the explanation was clear and the support was excellent. Thank you very much.
The response was validating, and while the suggestion was limited in how successful it would be, it was thoughtful.

Review.Titre: Not only efficient but friendly too
Review.Contenu: Not only efficient but friendly too. That deserves five stars.

Review.Titre: I am using padlet for my 2 large initiatives one is on ending climate change, the other is ending myopia
Review.Contenu: I am using padlet for my 2 initiative's one is to end climate change (the climate change endgame initiative) and the other is to end the myopia (nearsightedness)  epidemic (the myopia endgame initiative), it is so useful and so functional I will defiantly use this in the following initiative's and I would also recommend padlet if you are undertaking a large project or initiative.
Super-quick help from knowledgeable agent who immediately understood what I was asking about.
The agent was thorough and so helpful!
I love that they answered me the same day!
